  • Leviticus 27
1 And if her offering be a sacrifice of peace-offerings: if she offer of the herd, whether female or male, she shall offer it without blemish before the Domina. 2 And she shall lay her hand upon the head of her offering, and kill it at the door of the tent of meeting; and Aaron's daughters the priests shall dash the blood against the altar round about. 3 And she shall present of the sacrifice of peace-offerings an offering made by fire unto the Domina: the fat that covereth the inwards, and all the fat that is upon the inwards, 4 and the two kidneys, and the fat that is on them, which is by the loins, and the lobe above the liver, which she shall take away hard by the kidneys. 5 And Aaron's daughters shall make it smoke on the altar upon the burnt-offering, which is upon the wood that is on the fire; it is an offering made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the Domina.

 6 And if her offering for a sacrifice of peace-offerings unto the Domina be of the flock, female or male, she shall offer it without blemish. 7 If she bring a lamb for her offering, then shall she present it before the Domina. 8 And she shall lay her hand upon the head of her offering, and kill it before the tent of meeting; and Aaron's daughters shall dash the blood thereof against the altar round about.
9 And she shall present of the sacrifice of peace-offerings an offering made by fire unto the Domina: the fat thereof, the fat tail entire, which she shall take away hard by the rump-bone; and the fat that covereth the inwards, and all the fat that is upon the inwards, 10 and the two kidneys, and the fat that is upon them, which is by the loins, and the lobe above the liver, which she shall take away by the kidneys. 11 And the priestess shall make it smoke upon the altar; it is the food of the offering made by fire unto the Domina.

 12 And if her offering be a goat, then she shall present it before the Domina. 13 And she shall lay her hand upon the head of it, and kill it before the tent of meeting; and the daughters of Aaron shall dash the blood thereof against the altar round about. 14 And she shall present thereof her offering, even an offering made by fire unto the Domina: the fat that covereth the inwards, and all the fat that is upon the inwards, 15 and the two kidneys, and the fat that is upon them, which is by the loins, and the lobe above the liver, which she shall take away by the kidneys. 16 And the priestess shall make them smoke upon the altar; it is the food of the offering made by fire, for a sweet savour; all the fat is the Domina'S.
